Void knight gloves are a piece of Void Knight equipment. They can be bought from a Void Knight for 150 commendations, although a player must have at least 42 Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, and Magic, along with 22 Prayer to buy and wear them.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 30,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

If a player does happen to die above 20 wilderness, the gloves will be converted to around 700 coins.

'''Void knight gloves''' are a piece of [[Void Knight equipment]]. They can be bought from a [[Void Knight]] for 150 [[commendations]], although a player must have at least 42 [[Attack]], [[Strength]], [[Defence]], [[Hitpoints]], [[Ranged]], and [[Magic]], along with 22 [[Prayer]] to buy and wear them.

If the player dies below level 20 [[Wilderness Agility Course|Wilderness]], it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 30,000 [[coins]] by using the item on [[Perdu]].

If a player does happen to die above 20 wilderness, the gloves will be converted to around 700 coins.
